text:
[Verse]
Wake up to the dawn light
Cup of joe by my side
Say goodbye to the night
Ready for a new ride

[Verse 2]
Steam rises up high
Daydreams start to fly
Colors in the sky
Morning coffee my why

[Chorus]
Coffee in the morning
Keeps my heart soaring
Simple joys reborn
Every single dawn

[Verse 3]
Sip by sip I find peace
Heartbeats start to increase
Moments never cease
Happiness release

[Bridge]
Every drop so pure
Life becomes a blur
In each sip I'm sure
Joy I will incur

[Verse 4]
Watch the sunrise glow
In these moments slow
Take it nice and low
Mornings start to flow
title: Coffee In The Morning
